name: Queple's Sword
completionText: Congratulations! You solved the mystery of Queple's Sword!
Description: An ancient sword rests in a tomb. Find it and discover a way to use it, too!

flags.name: Quest Start
flags.description: You found a strange sword in an old tomb.

flags.name: Sword's Origins
flags.description: Ken told you the sword you found is probably from Tackure.

flags.name: A New Lead
flags.description: Ken told you to talk to Kumuhana in the village to learn more about the sword.

flags.name: The Sword Boss
flags.description: Kumuhana has revealed that the sword is a weapon from Imaynimayn.

flags.name: Told Kumuhana Mt. Queple
flags.description: You told Kumuhana you found the sword near Mt. Queple.

flags.name: Told Kumuhana Grave Robber
flags.description: You admitted to stealing the sword from a tomb.

flags.name: Kumuhana's Advice
flags.description: Kumuhana suggests returning the sword to the great Imaynimayn. Maybe he has something that can make it useable...

flags.name: Sword Completed
flags.description: You returned the cleaned sword to Queple's Tomb and activated the sword!
